articles.title: Tennis icon Martina Navratilova diagnosed with throat and breast cancer - India Today
articles.description: 18-time Grand Slam singles champion Martina Navratilova, 66, has been diagnosed with throat and breast cancer. The legendary player, who was set to commentate at the Australian Open, will begin treatment in January in New York.
